France: Chlothar II gave Austrasia its independence under the kingship of his son, Dagobert I.
Germany: Chlothar the Great donated Austrasia to his son Dagobert I.
Dagobert I took Arnulf of Metz, the bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Metz, as an adviser and appointed the Austrasian noble Pepin of Landen his mayor of the palace.
Slovenia: Uprising of Slavs led by Samo against Avars. Samo's Tribal Union is formed.
